title: 12/31/20 - HOUR-2 - Greg Cosell, Tua's Time, CFP Preview With James Laurinaitis
itunes:title: 12/31/20 - HOUR-2 - Greg Cosell, Tua's Time, CFP Preview With James Laurinaitis
description:
In Hour 2 of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, NFL analyst and senior producer at NFL Films, Greg Cosell, chats with Colin about the pressure facing Miami quarterback Tua Tagovailoa at the end of the regular season and possibly the playoffs, as well as Buffalo quarterback Josh Allen being more of a "generational talent" than one hot prospect coming out of college. Plus, former NFL and Ohio State All-American linebacker James Laurinaitis of the Big Ten Network jumps on to preview the College Football Playoff's two semifinal games on New Year's Day.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
